name: @drawing-captcha/drawing-captcha-frontend
description: The Drawing Captcha Frontend is a dynamic interface designed to seamlessly integrate with the Drawing Captcha App. It allows clients to interact with the captcha system in a visually engaging and secure manner. By incorporating interactive drawing tasks, users are prompted to complete specific patterns or color in logos, which helps verify human users while promoting brand awareness.
author: Williams Pesic (wpesicDev)
